information_what_is_p_okul_answer: P-School is a note sharing application written for Pamukkale University.
login_username_check: Make sure you spelled your username correctly.
login_name_check: Make sure you spelled your name correctly.
there_is_no_such_department: There is no such department in the university.
send_note_placeholder: You can add a description for the note or write what happened in life.
